name: Birds Beauty Salon
description:
Birds Beauty Salon

Prototype Studio Week 8 - PORTRAIT

Welcome to Birds Beauty Salon. Here you will use your brushes and paint to help the birds become what they want, though they never stand still.

How to play

  • Use your mouse to pick color and paint
  • Press R to Restart
  • Tip: The deepest black is only used to paint birds' eyes
